_header: A ferly thing it is to mean
_description: A Christmas carol — six 10-line stanzas with wheel rhyme, and burden: ‘Aye aye this is the day / That we shall worshep euer and eye’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
A ferly thyng it is to meneThat a mayd a chyld haue
                    borne…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Aye aye so þat we mayWend with him at domys
                    day
